page.title: 19Children's Games.
page.content: {(1.Hot Rice. } We stand in a circle with our legs apart.One person bounces a ball which is allowed to run through someones legs.This person then chases and tries to hit someone with the ball.When they are all hit the game begins again. {(2.Baseball: Baseball is like rounders only you use a 3ft. bat and a hard ball.You have to hit the ball and go round all the bases.You are out if you run and a base is blocked,also if you hit a catch. {(3.Skipping: You need your mum's washing line to skip with.One person holds the line at each end and turns it.The object of skipping is not to stop the rope while jumping over it.If you do then you take the place of whoever is turning the rope at one end.
